website_summaries.verdict: Delicious chocolate truffles with real mint flavor that have a loyal following of customers that can't get enough of their smooth consistency.
pros: Generous jar of chocolate mint truffles made of natural peppermint oil
Fans rave about the creamy texture that almost melts in your mouth
Fantastic chilled, frozen, or right out of the jar
cons: Very rare reports of batches with an "off" flavor

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the original Frangos
customer_reviews.text: I remember when Fredrick and Nelson store in Seattle brought Frangos to our lives. These were a favorite gift for others. Dilettante Chocolates is one of the better companies that create these lil nuggets of smooth chocolatey goodness. Popular with everyone I know! Especially the peppermint. Con... the peppermint flavor will dominate all the other's flavors!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Careful... these are sooo tasty!  Like Frangos
customer_reviews.text: Frango mint chocolates (from what was formerly Marshall Fields in Chicago) are one of my most favorite treats. I found these chocolate truffle mints at Costco and fell in love. They are very VERY similar to Frangos... a little softer, and the individual pieces are larger, but the satisfaction is the same. I haven't seen them at Costco lately, but was lucky to find this package through Amazon, a great price, for a really great treat! Delivery quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Dilettante ruins life with addictive products!!!  Just kidding - this company makes really, really good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the mint flavored ones, but had to try these cause I love toffee. They were Dilettante, so they were good, but I still like the mint ones which I am addicted to, I think, best. Given my addiction, this review may be unfair. They are definitely worth ordering and enjoying! I've been enjoying their chocolates since they were a tiny hole in the wall business in Seattle. I'd dance at Cornish and go there for a treat. Completely blew my program, but worth every calorie, and every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl2mk

customer_reviews.title: So so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas and they were gone within two weeks. I have bought two more containers and I don't think they will last long. They are delicious and addictive. The chocolate Is so amazing and creamy it truly just melts in your mouth. The mouth feel is heavenly with zero waxy left to ruin in like in so many other chocolates. The mint is a perfect level without being overbearing or the sharp taste you get from most other mint chocolate. I will be a lifelong customer of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelebmw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: Received an assortment as advertised in good condition. The chocolates themselves were lackluster in flavor, but had a smooth texture. The flavors were very muted and created almost no tastebud pleasure. These were not tempting nor did they satisfy our sweet tooth. We will never purchase these again for ourselves or as a gift, not worth the disappointment. Not worth the anticipation and did not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: At best, average and all flavors essentially taste the same - disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this purchase. Chocolate is good but nothing special at all. You can't taste any orange at all in the blood orange; the milk chocolate and ephemere and toffee all taste exactly the same except the toffee has an occasional crunch of something tasteless. The peppermint tastes like peppermint but it is very mild - very. I do not recommend purchasing this and I sure won't do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: They are my favorite ever!!! I can find them anytime on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them . I got them from Costco few years back for the first time and loved them but Costcoonly have them for a short period of time around Christmas...i was keep waiting for Christmas time to get them but somehow I always was late and couldn't find them. This year finally I got them but I only got 2 bags and by the time i went back there were no more. So I decided to search on amazon...and found them. Now I wont have to wait for Christmas to get them anymore. I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mints... but an off batch
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, and normally they are a solid 5 iny book. However, the product seems to have changed, they are still good but the batch I got the individual pieces seemed smaller especially in relation to the wrapper (I finished the last piece from another batch just last week) also they tasted saltier and less creamy and minty. Hopefully this was just an off batch and not an actual change
customer_reviews.author: Chiribita

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mint!
customer_reviews.text: Cost is too high, but I buy it because i love it. wish the price would come down. next time it's at Costco (November), I'll stock up on it!!! I almost shouldn't buy because of the price. otherwise it is great and I wish the company would get REAL and lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: Donna  V.

customer_reviews.title: A great little gift.
customer_reviews.text: I keep thus large jar handy to use as "thank yous" . We live in a retirement/assisted living community and these little chocolates. can be slipped into a greeting card, given to a staff member when they do a special favor., etc. Took some to our son's home at Thanksgiving to put 2 at each place setting. Everyone lives them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tasting chocolate mints I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting chocolate mints I have ever had. Expensive but worth it. A great gift for someone! Every time I have shared these the receiver has asked where I got them. They are absolutely delicious! : )
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: I loved the variety offered as each is unique
customer_reviews.text: These chocolate are very rich in taste. I loved the variety offered as each is unique. They are a bit expensive but no more than other signature chocolates. Will buy them again. It would make wonderful Christmas gifts and could be divided into three or four separate gifts which would be very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I keep them in the freezer and are so good.
customer_reviews.text: I typically order the Seattle Chocolates in bulk, but this time they were missing all the melt away mints. I found these on amazon and ordered to replace the mints I did not get- they are delicious! I keep them in the freezer and are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. These are addictive. More chocolate flavor and not sicky sweet. The chocolate taste is not bitter sweet, but a stronger chocolate than milk chocolate. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described. The flavors are not good.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived melted together. I live in Arizona and product shoud not be shipped here .
customer_reviews.author: Cook County RN

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as gifts for our trip for B and B hosts. I chose Dillettante Chocolates because of your great reputation for quality. I don't eat much chocolate but I know our hosts will be delighted to sample these fine truffles.
customer_reviews.author: patricia K. Beehler

customer_reviews.title: Great peppermint chocolate candy. Buy some !
customer_reviews.text: This candy is really delicious. They’re really smooth and they melt in your mouth. They’re nice and minty but not too strong. We will definitely be ordering more because they are going really fast.
customer_reviews.author: NVLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Candy Cane Truffles
customer_reviews.text: These CandyCane Trufflecremes arrived quickly and smell incredible when you open the lid. They are delicious! Perfect for the holidays. Highly recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Aruba

customer_reviews.title: Need to hide
customer_reviews.text: We love these things. Got mostly mint flavored ones, which is OK with me, but some people don't like mint. That works for me. I have to hide these in my desk or people will gobble them up when I left them out.
customer_reviews.author: Val Nakahara

customer_reviews.title: Delicious candy!
customer_reviews.text: These candies are absolutely, melt in your mouth delicious! They're a little spendy, but worth every penny and locally made. People love receiving them as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Library Lady

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love these chocolates. Very smooth and delicious. This is the second time I've bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten fussy about my chocolates and these are wonderful. I hate the cheap faux chocolate in cheap candy bars anymore, but these are addictive, they are sooooo goood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mint Truffles
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a bit of chocolate connoisseur and these are by far the best mint truffles I have ever had! They are now a staple in my home. I also love to use them to make mint hot chocolate. Heat up some milk, add a couple pieces and whisk! So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but really good!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. Happy the mint didn't affect the flavor of the other candies as mint can sometimes do. The blood orange is my favorite. There are a lot of pieces, but I had to knock off a star because they are pretty pricey, in my opinion. They're delicious and I am satisfied, but I probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Old Product
customer_reviews.text: I did get a refund which was refused at first, they apologized and said it must have been the heat. The chocolate was dry ,powdery, faded and appeared to be past it's shelf life, I should have taken a picture.
customer_reviews.author: shishkabobmt

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but melted
customer_reviews.text: I love these mints and was so sad when Costco quit carrying them. I found them online and was so excited so I ordered them. However, even though it was still winter in southern California at the time, they were all melted when I got them. Just one big blobby mess. Obviously not seller's fault. Probably not the best idea to order them online for me.
customer_reviews.author: lbuckner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need---a new addiction.  Rich and Creamy like no others
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are sooo good! Richness and creaminess I've not found since Frangos. I bought these for our Airbnb guests, but they may have to fight me for them - ha ha. Going to be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood P Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Best Mint Truffles
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this candy. First tasted this product when I bought it at Costco, but they only sell it around Christmas. Mint truffle candies have always been a favorite. Boehm's Candy in Issaquah sells the very best milk chocolate mint truffle, which my family has purchased since the 1950s, but as I no longer live in Washington, Dilettante's candies are the next best thing. So, thank you for selling their candy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth chocolate with a distinct mint flavor. Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these from Costco and the family loved them. When Costco no longer carried them, I was happy to find them on Amazon.They make a great little after dinner treat. Silky smooth chocolate with a distinct mint flavor. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: Need more peppermint
customer_reviews.text: Not too sweet, not bad, it does help hold my stomach during the late grave shift before my lunch time, though I wish it was much much more mintiier
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: these are so yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy Russell Stover French Chocolate Mints all the time but over the last few years I haven't been able to find them. I tried these and fell in love. So creamy and just enough mint. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D. MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Chocolatey minty blobs of heaven
customer_reviews.text: These used to be called mint melt-aways. The name says it all. If you fear chocolate mint addiction, stay away. You can never eat just one.
customer_reviews.author: Nils Mork

customer_reviews.title: Best milk chocolate mint ever
customer_reviews.text: Best milk chocolate mint out there! My cousin gave me a baggie for a trip home by the time I got home I was searching online to find them! Put in freezer and omgosh great after dinner mint!
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly good truffles!!
customer_reviews.text: These truffles are so damn good!! We sell all the flavors in our coffee shop. They go like hotcakes. My absolute favorite is candy cane!! They're like a meltaway. I'm sitting at my desk and they're calling my name!! I have to go downstairs and get a couple!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: These have the texture of candy cane crunches in a melty chocolate candy!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious with little bits of candy cane texture that is delectable. These are melty in your mouth chocolate lovelies with a delightful candy cane ground up texture that makes these even better tasting! YUM!~
customer_reviews.author: Ida Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Just the right Peppermint
customer_reviews.text: Love these little snack treats. Have them in small ice cream bowls in the den and bedroom. If you like chocolate, the soft centers melt in your mouth. Peppermint is not over powering at all. Good for after dinner mints on the table.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mint truffles ever. Just the right amt of mint flavor and nice creamy texture. I live these
customer_reviews.author: Candace Grabania

customer_reviews.title: Rich and Creamy!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in thr mail today. I tried them and they are delicious! So creamy and rich! I'm definitely going to order them again, but it won't be for a while since there are A LOT of them. It's a great deal for the quality and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best chocolates ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best chocolates ever. According to my estimates I have eaten well over a hundred pounds so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the different flavors had mint flavoring.
customer_reviews.text: I think they melted and then solidified again. Every flavor had a mint flavor to them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Love these chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chocolates. Exceptionally creamy milk chocolates with just the right amount of crispy candy cane inside. Everyone who has tried these loves them! I also tried the plain and the toffee versions and the are delicious as well. My favorite is this one with the candy cane
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought these toffee chocolates is due to me being given some of the creme de menthe (green wrapped) chocolates during the holidays. They are absolutely delicious! Their chocolate is rich, creamy, and amazing, add in toffee and almond bits and you've got a treat you will not want to stop eating. I really want to get the other flavors soon!
customer_reviews.author: WooGirl

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHOCOLATE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: FAMILY JUST LOVES THIS CANDY....CHOCOLATE CREME TRUFFLES...A+++++ TRY IT YOU'LL LOVE IT !!
customer_reviews.author: nanausa

customer_reviews.title: Hide them!
customer_reviews.text: My wife asks me to hide these in the house so she is not tempted to eat too many too fast. They are excellent
customer_reviews.author: MJLogan42

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. The chocolates are minty and creamy. I will def order again. If you like mint, try it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio C

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Truffle
customer_reviews.text: Love these little snack treats. I also bought the ones in peppermint and they are delish! Have them in small ice cream bowls in the den and bedroom. If you like chocolate, the soft centers melt in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and creamy chocolates at a great price! Will be buying these again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DEENY119

customer_reviews.title: Best Chocolates
customer_reviews.text: These melt in your mouth, best chocolates we had in a long time. Bought both the dark and mint flovors and both are worth cheating off a diet for.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and good chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are really delicious and are individually wrapped. Highly recommended if you like truffles!
customer_reviews.author: nopalen

customer_reviews.title: Compare to Frangos!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the NW and we get these and Frangos . These are the favorite every year! Win every taste taste at our house. And cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty mint chocolate truffles. Very addictive. I highly recommend these everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These are amazing. Really good quality chocolates, with a great, subtle mint flavor. Melts in your mouth, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious !Definitely would order them again and again
customer_reviews.author: duffer

customer_reviews.title: RE-Order product.
customer_reviews.text: I can take this to work and share with the staff.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Bought at Costco
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to wait until they have them next Christmas. Everybody loves them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geneadig

customer_reviews.title: Habbit forming
customer_reviews.text: 2 in the after noon,,,,,,,,, 2 of the toffee after dinner.
customer_reviews.author: THE GOUCH

customer_reviews.title: Habbit forming
customer_reviews.text: These are addicting.. I have to regiment me to 2 per day.
customer_reviews.author: THE GOUCH

customer_reviews.title: The best mint truffles I've ever tasted. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.text: Too good! I think I ate them all in two days time.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality chocolates. They didn’t last long, everybody loved them and ate them quick.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS!! Has piece of candy cane in the chocolate. Everybody loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzermom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, creamy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. A staple in our house for Christmas. Love gifting them in smaller goodie bags too.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwomanrules

customer_reviews.title: Quality truffles
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can now obtain these outside of Costco at Christmas time
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Rich and creamy
customer_reviews.text: These truffle cremes are so chocolatey, rich and creamy . Everyone who has tried them , love them. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dilettante chocolates are the very best chocolates made in the USA, IMHO! I love these too much.
customer_reviews.author: In the Woods

customer_reviews.title: Melt in your mouth.
customer_reviews.text: We love these small bites of very rich,creamy chocolate with tiny pieces of toffee. This is our 2nd jar and we will be getting more. Thinking of trying the mint flavor too.
customer_reviews.author: LINNY

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a 5 star for giftable BUT gift them to yourself first!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Pro: melt in your mouth delicious. Con: Too melt in your mouth delicious. I have to hoard them or they disappear too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylib Santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing peppermint chocolates ever!! Creamy and perfect amount of peppermint!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Quality is important
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!!! I love chocolate and mint. They are rich and creamy with a smooth texture. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Niverth

customer_reviews.title: Tasty truffles!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Once one melts in your mouth, hard to stop. Up there where "ice cubes" used to be. Pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Value!
customer_reviews.text: approx. 3 truffles per ounce. Perfect Valentines Day giveaways. I got 88 pieces in this container, which had a Best Buy date in 12/2018.
customer_reviews.author: Sangio

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The wife was happy with the product and made small gift packs with them.
customer_reviews.author: Les Harpley

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought a couple of the flavors were excellent. Not s fan of the milk chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: GISELLE R DEW

customer_reviews.title: Mint chocolate delicious
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed these creamy truffle candies ,as well as my friends and family have. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vargas

customer_reviews.title: These are delish!
customer_reviews.text: These are crazy good. I buy them every year for the holidays to put in stockings and to add to gifts. They are. Army and delish.
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth
customer_reviews.text: These are more for chocolate lovers than mint lovers. The taste is smooth and delicious! Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Mild dark chocolate at best
customer_reviews.text: These truffles don't have the "kick" that you get from good dark chocolate. I get more of a kick from the Dove dark chocolate miniatures. If you want good dark chocolate, these are not the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: much prefer the Raspberry Truffle, which unfortunately they are no longer making.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Almost The Same
customer_reviews.text: The closest to the original Franco Mints I have found!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and you can't eat just one, I promise!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you plan to share! Smooth and creamy mint chocolate. Just like the name says, smooth truffles just not round!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Melt in your mouth delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are so delicious! Melt in your mouth creamy with the great flavors of Chocolate and Mind combined. I savor these for myself and have given them as gifts. Always well received. They are individually wrapped as pictured so they are great to put out in a candy dish for multiple consumers.
customer_reviews.author: JubilantJo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, melt in your mouth, smooth, and devine.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift for Father's Day, but I suggest you ask the seller to ship with a cold pack, since hot summer weather and chocolate don't mix.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to find these chocolates are still available - they are so good if you like a mix of mint and chocolate and I do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: They got here in time, were good (according to my husband) and lasted a very short time, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Beedon

customer_reviews.title: yum!
customer_reviews.text: husband is so addicted he bought another jar of them after Christmas to share at his office!
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Knapke

customer_reviews.title: If you love "melt away" types of mint chocolate then this is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you love "melt away" types of mint chocolate then this is a good one to try. This is our second Christmas ordering a jar to have around and they are perfect. Very tasty and nicely minted.
customer_reviews.author: R P

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Use these in little take home boxes for our Christmas Party! Always a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Lene Brooks

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: good quality & variety Like these just out of refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to fill a candy dish over the holidays and they were a huge hit! I was glad to have a few leftover. They taste especially good when you warm them up in your hand for 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: It's hard for us to find candy for our son ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard for us to find candy for our son who has issues with artificial ingredients. I was thankful to come across these and not are they delicious!! Very creamy with just a hint of toffee. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adeana  E Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for years as a gift for a teacher. They are yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull Bloom on Chocolate but Still Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I am not too sure if I got a "bad" batch. Not aesthetically pleasing due to the dull bloom on all the chocolate.... However, my chocolate was still good. Maybe the chocolate was incorrectly stored and caused the dull bloom on the chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: R. mcd

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chocolates. Very creamy with a hint of mint. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Moon 2 Dance 2

customer_reviews.title: Bad timing on my order
customer_reviews.text: Due to the Heat and Arizona the product was an edible it arrived as a glob of chocolate liquid
customer_reviews.author: vic mason

customer_reviews.title: VERY good!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift in return for a favor a friend did for me! She and her family just loved these!
customer_reviews.author: DCK

customer_reviews.title: Delicious. Reminds me of Fanny Farmer little green covered ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Reminds me of Fanny Farmer little green covered chololate mints.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Absolute a Dream
customer_reviews.text: I'll go ahead and copy my headline/subject: Absolute a dream. This is the good stuff when it comes to incredible mint chocolate. I think that truffle filling makes all the difference. So good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Condition of the dark chocolates
customer_reviews.text: The darkest chocolate pieces had a white coating. They were either old or frozen before shipping. The other flavors were fine, just the dark ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Christian

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Creamy, not overly minty.
customer_reviews.text: These mints are fairly creamy chocolate with a touch of mint. Think of a creamy Andes chocolate mint.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finegan

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty and hard to put down
customer_reviews.text: So good my mom literally ate the whole container as soon as I opened it, I went to school and came back and the whole thing was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Stovetop

product_meta.title: Peppermint Chocolate Trufflecremes in Double Milk Chocolate - 28oz Jar - by Dilettante
feature_bullets: Velvety-smooth milk chocolate truffles with fresh peppermint flavor
Bite-sized chocolate truffles individually wrapped in vibrant green foils
Made with all natural ingredients; high-quality gourmet chocolates; Bulk size great for parties, office occasions, filling candy dishes; Product of the USA
1 Bulk Jar of Peppermint Chocolate Trufflecremes; net weight 28 ounces
WARM WEATHER SHIPPING RATE IN EFFECT: Your order is shipped with an ice pack and special packaging to keep the product(s) at the perfect temperature
